==Puzzles==
===Torch Puzzle===
There are three unlit torches west of the [[Teleport Waypoint]]. Use any {{Pyro}} ability to active it and reveal a [[Common Chest]].

==Descriptions==
{{Description|These high mountains were once a place to observe upcoming storms.<br>Nowadays, all that remains is an abandoned watchtower with monsters roaming around.|[[Expedition]] description}}
